text.title: Create a Drop Shipped T Shirt Website
text.head: Create a Drop Shipped T Shirt Website
text.p: Have you ever wanted to start your own T-Shirt company, but didn't have enough money to purchase inventory? Well drop-shipping is right for you! Drop-Shipping takes all the production and shipment out of your hands, so you can focus on creating your T-Shirt designs and promoting your brand.
text.head: Steps

list.item:
Create your Brand Name
Many people will gloss over this step thinking it's not that important, but when it comes to clothing and design. Branding is actually very important!
Come up with a unique name that fits your niche.
If you are having trouble, try writing down all the characteristics of your designs, potential customers, and of yourself. Then just start combining words and see what you come up with!

Create your website
Head to shopify.com
Create an account; You start with a 14 day risk free trial, and you can upgrade at the end of it. 2 weeks should give you enough time to expirement around with shopify, and see if there is any demand for your T-Shirts

Customize your website
In the navigation pane, under "Sales channel", click "Online Store"
Click on "Visit Theme Store"
Click the dropdown menu and select "Clothing & Fashion"
If you aren't looking to pay 180$ for a theme, any free theme will do just fine. (You can always change this later)

Visit App Store
Start by pressing Apps, located in the bottom corner of the sidebar right above settings
Click "Visit Shopify App Store"

Install Printful
Search "Printful"
Install the app by pressing "Install this app" and follow through the registration process
Make sure the email used for registration is the same used for your shopify

Create your designs
No matter what program is used make sure the output is a PNG file
Required dimensions for a normal T-Shirt Design on Printful is 3000 x 3000 with 300 DPI
Below are settings that can be used on PhotoShop and Illustrator. Other programs may have a different layout or different wording but the concept remains the same.

Upload your designs
Select PrintFul on the "Apps" page to begin uploading your first design
Begin by pressing "Add Product" at the top of the page

Select the products you would like your design on
Select whatever style T-Shirt or tank you would like (Be sure to select matching colors)
Although this is a write up on how to DropShip T-Shirts, you can also select other products to put your designs on other products

Finalize the upload
Adjust the positioning accordingly, make sure your design is centered!
Select "Proceed to pricing" when you are done

Pricing
At this point, you could select how much profit you would like to receive from each shirt
Don't be afraid to higher the prices, especially if the designs are high quality
Edit your title & description so that it looks as professional as possible
Once you are done, select "Submit to store"

I have my first designs uploaded, now what?
Now comes the hard part: Getting customers
Try showing your friends your designs and getting feedback on how to improve your site
We live in a very social age, use it to your advantage. Social media advertising is the most effective way to advertise your brand/product.
Research how to improve your search rankings on Google and other search platforms.

Don't give up
This is the most important step of all.
Everything you have done would be for nothing if you give up after 2 weeks of no sales.
It may take days, weeks, or even months to get your first sale. This is normal. Stay Calm and trust in your designs.
Keep your site updated! Keep pushing those designs, and advertise them on social media.
